function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Building occupants' satisfaction and demands on IEQ parameters are not studied under natural conditions.","Impact":"Misalignment between subjective perceptions and objective parameters in real-life scenarios, leading to poor indoor environmental quality.","Mitigation":"Conduct studies of building occupants' satisfaction and demands on IEQ parameters under natural conditions, taking into account uncontrolled activities and behaviors.","Technologies":"Sensors, mobile interfaces, and data collection and analysis tools for monitoring and analyzing IEQ parameters in real-time.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, researchers, and policymakers.","Owner":"Researchers, building owners, and facility managers."},{"Description":"Indoor air and CO2 concentration affect occupant satisfaction.","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality and high CO2 concentration leading to low occupant satisfaction and potential health risks.","Mitigation":"Improve indoor air quality and ventilation systems to maintain appropriate CO2 levels and enhance occupant satisfaction.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air quality monitors, ventilation systems, and air purification technologies.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and building owners.","Owner":"Facility managers and building owners."},{"Description":"Differences in climate and HVAC systems between northern and southern China affect thermal experiences and preferences.","Impact":"Variability in thermal satisfaction and preferences due to differences in climate and HVAC systems, leading to discomfort and dissatisfaction among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Adapt HVAC systems and building design to suit regional climate differences, and provide personalized thermal comfort solutions to occupants.","Technologies":"Building energy management systems, HVAC zoning, and personalized comfort control technologies.","People":"Building occupants, HVAC engineers, architects, and facility managers.","Owner":"Building owners, HVAC engineers, and facility managers."}]}
